Title: Spirited Away
Description: During her family's move to the suburbs* a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods* witches and spirits* a world where humans are changed into beasts.

Title: My Neighbor Totoro
Description: Mei and Satsuki shift to a new house to be closer to their mother who is in the hospital. They soon become friends with Totoro* a giant rabbit-like creature who is a spirit.
